com.github.kpgtb.ktools.manager.item

Class KItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kpgtb.ktools.manager.item.KItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public abstract class KItem
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Abstract class that handles process of preparing custom item
    Since:
    1.3.0
